company_context: Clickatell: Global Leader in Chat Commerce, SMS APIs & More | Clickatell Log In Contact Support Platform Solutions Pricing Resources About Us Contact Sales Try for free AI-POWERED CHAT COMMERCE Catch a flight Airline Solutions

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a leading provider of data processing solutions. I came across Clickatell and was impressed with your work in chat commerce. I'd love to explore how our solution can help you enhance your data capabilities.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, thanks for reaching out, Alex. I'm John, the CTO here. We're always looking for ways to improve our tech stack, but I have to say, our plate is pretty full at the moment. What makes DeepData AI unique compared to other data processing solutions out there?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Great question, John. Our AI-powered engine allows for faster and more accurate data processing, which can significantly reduce costs and improve decision-making. We've seen our clients achieve up to 30% reduction in data processing time. I'd be happy to set up a demo to show you how it works.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: That sounds interesting, but we're currently in the middle of a major system integration project. I'm not sure if this is the right time to consider new tools. Plus, I've heard similar claims from other vendors, so I'd need to see some concrete proof of your solution's effectiveness. And to be honest, our budget for new tools is pretty tight this quarter.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your concerns, John. We've worked with several companies in similar situations, and our solution can actually help with system integration by providing more efficient data processing. As for proof, we have several case studies from reputable companies that I can share with you. Regarding budget, we offer flexible pricing plans that can accommodate your needs.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate your understanding, Alex, but I have to be frank with you â€“ even if I were interested, I don't have the budget authority to approve new purchases. Our CFO handles all new tool acquisitions, and they're pretty strict about staying within our allocated budget. We also have existing contracts with other data processing vendors that we need to see through before considering new options.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I see. Well, perhaps we could schedule a follow-up conversation with your CFO to discuss how DeepData AI can fit into your future plans? Or if there's any way I can provide more information to you that could help build a case for our solution?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Thank you, Alex, but I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI for now. We appreciate the outreach, but with our current priorities and budget constraints, it's not feasible for us to consider new data processing solutions at this time.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Authority
Feedback: The seller should have asked about involving the CFO earlier in the conversation to potentially overcome the budget authority issue sooner. Sentiment: Neutral

parsed.feedback: The seller should have asked about involving the CFO earlier in the conversation to potentially overcome the budget authority issue sooner. Sentiment: Neutral
